Package hoppers

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • hoppers.Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
    public class Board
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Board is a class that abstracts a checker board and allows Squares to be placed on.
    Version:
    2020/5/24
    Author:
    Hao Yukun (GitHub: Night-Voyager), Huo Jiaxin (GitHub: Huo614)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • level

        private int level
        The level of the game.

      • state

        private int state
        The state of the game.

        - State.WIN, or 1, if the player wins a level of the game

        - State.IN_PROGRESS, or 0, if the game is in progress

        - State.LOSE, or -1, if the player loses a level of the game

        See Also:
        Board.State

      • clip

        private static javax.sound.sampled.Clip clip
        The stream of the audio to be played.

      • squares

        java.util.ArrayList<Square> squares
        An ArrayList that stores all the Square objects of the Board.
        See Also:
        Square

      • timer

        static java.util.Timer timer
        The timer that counts the time that the player uses to win a level.

      • timing

        static Board.Timing timing
        The TimerTask object that used to control the tasks of the timer.
        See Also:
        Board.Timing

        Parameters:

        sq2 - The second chosen square
